articles.title: The Future of LLMs is People: Vurvey Labs Launches Vurbs, AI Agents Powered by Real-Time Human Insights
articles.author: Vurvey Labs
articles.summary: Vurvey Labs, an AI research and platform company serving global brands like Adidas, Kenvue and Unilever, today unveiled Vurbs. It's the world's first AI agent ecosystem dynamically powered by real-time human insights.

articles.title: I Wore the TCL RayNeo X3 Pros at MWC 2025. This Is What AR Smart Glasses Should Be
articles.author: Katie Collins
articles.summary: TCL's RayNeo X3 Pro AR glasses, first announced at CES, provide a compelling alternative to more-basic smart glasses, such as the Meta Ray-Bans. The glasses are light enough to wear without feeling uncomfortable, but they still looked comically large on my head. The gesture controls on the arms of the glasses work flawlessly.

articles.title: If you've got lots of glass and mirrors, this clever robot will be a godsend, but I have one annoying gripe
articles.author: SARAH FITZMAURICE
articles.summary: The ECOVACS WINBOT W2 PRO OMNI is the first robotic window cleaner to boast its own portable station. It's currently on sale for $899. The robot has racked up a number of five star reviews from happy customers. The battery lasts for 110 minutes and the unit is easy to carry.

articles.title: If You Want To Make Your Life Easier, These 61 Home Items May Help
articles.author: Amanda Davis
articles.summary: Pink Stuff is a one-for-all cleaning product for hard-to-get stains, dirt, and rust spots around the house. Water-absorbent coasters are fast-acting when it comes to liquid cleanup and have a cork bottom so there is no unwanted movement. LightDims is a small business based in Las Vegas that makes LED covers for electronics.

articles.title: High-end Android Smartphones
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Oppo is set to make waves in the premium smartphone market with the launch of its much-awaited flagship, the OPPO Poco F.A.G.H.I.S.C.E. is launching its flagship smartphone, the Oppo Poco G2.

articles.title: Generate MCP servers from your docs
articles.summary: Mintlify allows you to generate Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers from your documentation. MCP is a standard released by Anthropic in November 2024 to simplify how applications can provide context to large language models (LLMs). MCP servers expose your data to AI and MCP clients allow access to that data.

articles.title: Dave Damman, SVP, Chief Creative Officer, PETERMAYER
articles.author: Dave Damman
articles.summary: Breakthrough creative ideas need to go beyond what brands can do for the consumer. They have to draw the consumer into the game to be creative.      Â  .   in this case, the creative idea needs to be about drawing the consumer in.

articles.title: The perfect blend of technology, branded gifts, and selection websites
articles.author: IN COOPERATION WITH NICKLAS
articles.summary: Yuval Nicklas is the Manager of Swag Operations at NICKLAS. He shares with us the winning combination of technology, branded gifts, and selection websites to create an innovative solution suitable for any organization, regardless of size or budget. The company works with well-known brands from Israel and around the world, so employees can choose from a selection of luxury gifts.

articles.title: I Convinced All My Friends to Ditch Their $$$ Foundation for This $10 BB Cream
articles.author: Samantha Jones
articles.summary: The Maybelline Dream Fresh Skin Hydrating BB Cream is 20% off at Ulta Beauty. It's an eight-in-one formula that brightens, smoothes, hydrates, evening out skin tone, and enhances glow. Samantha Jones is a commerce editor at Hearst magazines. She has over six years of editorial experience.

articles.title: Manus AI: The Next-Gen AI Agent Taking Over China—And Soon, The World?
articles.author: Nickie Louise
articles.summary: A new AI agent called Manus is making waves in China. It was launched this week by Chinese AI startup Manus AI. It's a mix of Deep Research, Operator and Claude Computer, bringing automation and execution into one system. It works independently in the cloud, so users can assign tasks, step away, and return to finished work.

articles.title: Nature's Fynd Wins Prestigious NEXTY Award for Dairy-Free Fy™ Yogurt
articles.author: Nature'S Fynd
articles.summary: Nature's Fynd has been named the winner of the 2025 NEXTY Awards for its Dairy-Free Strawberry Fy™ Yogurt in the Dairy Alternative category. Fy Yogurt has a smooth, creamy texture and a rich, satisfying taste that rivals traditional dairy yogurt. It delivers 8g of protein and 6g of fiber per serving with live and active cultures, probiotics, vitamin D, and calcium. It is available at Whole Foods Markets nationwide in three flavors: strawberry, peach and vanilla.

articles.title: 5 ways the Nvidia app falls behind AMD Adrenalin
articles.author: Joe Rice-Jones
articles.summary: AMD and Nvidia have different software packages for their graphics cards. AMD's Adrenalin is laid out better and is easy to use. The Nvidia app has some issues with offline connectivity and some missing features. AMD Adrenalin has presets for several potential overclock, undervolts and overvolts, but you also get manual tuning for more options of frequencies, voltages and more.

articles.title: What do you think of Google's AI Overview feature?
articles.author: Amanda Kondolojy
articles.summary: Select EA games are now available on Amazon's Luna cloud gaming service. Amazon has released a new update for Kindle devices that let you turn pages without touching the screen. Scooby Doo scares up a new show at Netflix, T-Mobile customers can redeem a $150 streaming freebie and more.

articles.author: Golden Gate Media
articles.summary: Summer Blueberry & Lemon, Passion Fruit & Sweet Pear, and Sweet Lemon Coconut are new Häagen-Dazs sorbets. They are available nationwide and cost $6.99 each. Häagens is operated by Dreyer's Grand Ice Cream in Walnut Creek, CA.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: A Slimmer, Lighter Flagship Priced Around $1,000
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is set to shake up its Galaxy S25 lineup with an unexpected addition, the Samsung S25 Edge. It is expected to be launched in April. It will be unveiled at Samsung Unpacked event on April 25th 2025. It's expected to have a 6mm thick screen and a camera with a wide view.

articles.title: The top 6 gadget reveals of MWC 2025 that got the internet buzzing
articles.author: Ece Yildirim
articles.summary: Samsung's latest Galaxy S25 phones stole the spotlight at the Galaxy Unpacked event. Samsung deemed the Edge model to be its thinnest yet. We still don't know much about the Samsung Galaxy S26. Samsung's new phone was first unveiled in January.

articles.title: CITAD launches e-Commerce platform for African businesses
articles.author: Kola Oyelere
articles.summary: The Centre for Information Technology and Development (CITAD) has launched an e-commerce platform, ShopB.Africa. The platform was officially unveiled today at CITAD's office in Kano. It was developed by a team of eight young innovators from the Itas community in Bauchi State.

articles.title: Digital Silk Unveils New Branding Strategies to Help Businesses Stand Out in Competitive U.S. Markets
articles.author: NEWSFILE
articles.summary: Digital Silk is an award-winning Los Angeles-based digital agency specializing in website design, branding, and digital marketing. Its latest branding strategies combine data-driven insights with creative storytelling to develop cohesive brand identities that resonate with target audiences and drive long-term growth.

articles.title: Vax's best-selling spot cleaner that removes spills and stains
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: The Vax SpotWash Duo Spot Cleaner is on sale on Amazon for £89.99, down from its original price of £139.99. Shark has just announced a £50 discount on its StainStriker Stain and Spot Cleaning, now offered at £99.99 instead of the usual £149.99 and has seen over 5,000 units sold in the past month.

articles.title: Justice Dept. Is Said to Put Two Prosecutors in Adams Case on Leave -…
articles.summary: Information about your activity on this service can be stored and combined with other information about you. This information is used to build or improve a profile about you that might include possible interests and personal aspects. Your profile can be used to present advertising that appears more relevant based on your possible interests.

articles.title: Una Healy wears standout floral frock at opening of Lidl beauty dupe range –  and you can rent it for just €110
articles.author: Kate Stafford
articles.summary: Una Healy looked stunning at the launch of Lidl's new beauty range. She rented the Elliatt Anthea floral dress from Off The rails for €110. The original dress retails for a pricier €432 on the Revolve website. Una's favourite product from the range is Peptide Restore Glossy Oil.

articles.title: ScrcpyForAndroid is the app you didn't know you needed
articles.author: Andrew Myrick
articles.summary: ScrcpyForAndroid is a cross-platform app for Android and Windows. It allows you to use your Android device on a Windows computer without having to pick it up. Scrcpy was first released in October 2024. It works on any Android device with USB Debugging enabled.

articles.title: Layla Hybrid Mattress Review 2025: A Flippable Hybrid Bed With a Memory Foam Feel Gets Put to the Test
articles.author: JD Christison
articles.summary: Layla Hybrid is a double-sided mattress with two firmness levels. It's suitable for all sleeping positions and regulates temperature better than a typical memory-foam bed. According to a CNET survey, six out of 10 US adults are willing to invest in their sleep setup which includes a mattress.

articles.title: Shoppers Say This Effective, Under-$20 French Pharmacy Balm Is the ‘Perfect Night Cream'
articles.author: Taylor Lane
articles.summary: The changing of the seasons can wreak havoc on your skin. Cicaplast is a multi-purpose moisturizer suitable for the face, body and hands. Amazon shoppers say it makes the 'perfect night cream' especially for those with sensitive skin or who use retinol or tretinoin cream.

articles.title: New Look's 'light' and 'padded' summer sandals that are 'so comfortable' reduced to £20
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: The New Look sandals were originally priced at £27.99 and have been reduced to £20. They are available in sizes 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 and 9 and are made from a nubuck-suedette material. Shoppers have rated the comfortable footwear a 4.4 out of 5.

articles.title: Google test new AI-based search mode
articles.author: Alimat Aliyeva
articles.summary: Google will begin testing a new AI-based search mode based on artificial intelligence. The new feature, known as AI Mode, simultaneously runs several related search queries in the background, anticipating which subtopics users will be interested in next. It then presents a holistic answer that summarizes multiple search directions. Google plans to make interactions with AI Mode more visual.

articles.title: Asda offers people called Greg a free sausage roll
articles.author: Mary Stenson
articles.summary: Greg or Gregory can get a free sausage roll from Asda today (March 7). They have to show their ID at the rotisserie counter in any Asda and show their name as Greg or Gregory or another variation of the name spelling to claim the offer.

articles.title: NDI Releases New Metadata Standards, Launches Open Initiative To Revolutionize Broadcast & Pro AV
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: NDI is a global standard for plug-and-play connectivity. New documentation details how to leverage seamless, bidirectional XML metadata exchange between NDI senders and receivers to enable new workflows, remote control, and smarter automation for live events and broadcast environments. The new release also introduces four new official standard metadata elements developed in collaboration with some of the most innovative brands in the NDI Ecosystem.

articles.title: A global dress distributor gave AI a chance. Now it makes creative content faster, and overstock is down 40%.
articles.author: Satta Sarmah Hightower
articles.summary: Amarra is a New Jersey-based manufacturer and wholesaler of special-occasion dresses. It has used AI to help with inventory management and content creation over the past five years. It also uses AI to optimize its marketing and customer service operations and analyze market trends. AI chatbots now handle 70% of customer inquiries.

articles.title: Armani Luminous Silk Foundation Review: We Put the Celeb-Approved Formula to the Test
articles.author: Kara Kia
articles.summary: Armani's Luminous Silk Foundation first launched in 2000. It's loved by A-listers including Sabrina Carpenter and Sydney Sweeney. Cosmo's e-commerce beauty team gave it a go for the first time. Kara Kia, E-commerce Editor, gave it 6.25 out of 7.5. Clare Stephenson, Senior Beauty Writer gave it 5.5 out of 6.

articles.title: Next selling 'classy' satin midi skirt that 'doesn't crease' in a trending colour
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Next is selling a versatile midi skirt priced at £32. The Satin Midi Skirt is available in a range of colours, including black, pink, chocolate brown, navy and buttermilk yellow. The skirt is made from an 'ultra smooth' satin fabric and can be styled for both formal and casual occasions.

articles.title: DITP to Promote Thailand's International Trade Image and Launch New Logo Under "3E CREATE POSSIBILITIES" Concept to Boost Thailand's Global Trade Position on March 12
articles.summary: Department of International Trade Promotion (DITP) is organizing an event to promote Thailand's international trade image and launch its new logo under the "3E CREATE POSSIBILITIES" concept. The event will take place on March 12, 2025 at the Manopakorn Nitithada Room, 12th floor of the DITP headquarters at the Ministry of Commerce.

articles.title: Fortnite early patch notes for update 34.10 – Invincible collabs, new weapons, ping changes and more
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: A new update is coming for Fortnite. It's set to deliver a number of new features including a fresh bout of weapons and changes to the game's multiplayer mode. It will be released on Friday, November 30th. It is expected to include a fresh batch of weapons.

articles.title: How Yelp reviewed competing LLMs for correctness, relevance and tone to develop its user-friendly AI assistant
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Yelp's AI-powered service search assistant, Yelp Assistant, was launched in April 2024 to a broader swathe of customers, but usage figures for its AI tools started to decline after it was rolled out to all users. It turned out that casual users didn't expect to be talking with an AI representative.

articles.title: Red Bull Unveils Exciting New Flavors Nationwide on March 3 Including Grapefruit, Juneberry
articles.author: Golden Gate Media
articles.summary: Red Bull is launching new flavors on March 3, 2025. Red Bull Sea Blue Edition Sugarfree Juneberry and Red Bull Pink Edition Wild Berries are two of the new flavors. The drinks will be available at select retailers across the U.S. in cans.

articles.title: Quad creates branded solutions business segment
articles.author: Ashley Smart
articles.summary: Sussex-based Quad has created a new business segment focused on creating customized merchandise for brands. For several years, Quad has been expanding and tailoring its offerings to address modern marketing challenges. Quad's sales have generally trended down from a peak of $4.86 billion as print volumes decline.

articles.title: The spring day hack to clean your duvet without a washing machine – it kills bacteria & germs & leaves it smelling fresh
articles.author: Digital Writer
articles.summary: The weather is getting warmer, so it's easier to get things clean and dry. My Luxury Sleep Shop recommends airing your duvet outside in the middle of a dry stretch. The duvet will need around four to five hours of airing time, during which the sunshine will get to work killing germs.

articles.title: ‘Omg stunning!' Asda shoppers spot perfect pjs for spring but some say they give ‘Edwardian vibes'
articles.author: Chloe Sharp

articles.title: Amazon Announces New GameLift Streams for Low-Lag Gaming on Most Devices
articles.author: Jessica Fritsch
articles.summary: Amazon GameLift Streams allows game developers to deliver high-resolution, low-latency gaming experiences through a web browser. Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc., Jackbox Games, Ludeo, and Xsolla have adopted the service. The service operates on a global cloud network, offering 1080p, 60 fps gameplay almost instantly.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10S Pro+ features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: iQOO is preparing to launch the Neo 10S series in China. It is expected to include the Neo 9S and Neo 9.5S. iQOO has already launched the Neo 8S and the Neo 7S in China and is planning to launch a 10S.

articles.title: Samsung teases Nintendo Switch 2 rival with 'bendy screen' – but there's a catch
articles.author: Lloyd Coombes
articles.summary: The Samsung Flex Gaming Handheld is a proof of concept for now. Samsung is looking to take on Nintendo, Lenovo, MSI, and Valve's Steam Deck with its own foldable phone. Samsung revealed the prototype at Mobile World Conference (MWC) in Barcelona this week.

articles.title: Fresh Take: Food Industry Reaction To Tariffs At Expo West Convention
articles.author: Chloe Sorvino
articles.summary: Chloe Sorvino is at Expo West in California. Bryce Lundberg, co-owner of rice company Lundberg Family Farms, made a joke about the brewing trade war. Chloe will share her Expo West takeaways in next week's edition of Forbes Fresh Take newsletter.

articles.title: Eve Mattress review: I tried the Wunderflip Premium Hybrid — it's two mattresses for the price of one
articles.author: Kiya-Ellen Syrett
articles.summary: Eve Sleep Wunderflip Premium Hybrid sleep mattress costs £999 for a double. Eve Sleep is a self-professed pioneer of the online mattress business. She loved the comfort layer, which is unzippable and allows you to customise the mattress to your desired firmness. The only downside is the price.

articles.title: New Seafood Products Drop as Lenten Season Kicks Off
articles.summary: Zaxbys, SeaPak, and Natural Grocers have released limited-time only (LTO) offerings for the Lenten season, which runs from March 5 to April 17 this year. McDonald's, Red Lobster, Popeyes, Taco John's, Jack in the Box, and Long John Silver's are already showcasing new or existing menu items.

articles.author: NEWSFILE

Its website redesign services focus on improving UX, streamlining navigation and optimizing for higher lead generation and sales. Businesses partnering with Digital Silk for website redesigns in New York have reported significant improvements in site performance, engagement, and conversion rates.

articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Mother's Day 2025 falls on March 30 this year. NIO Cocktails has created a variety of expertly crafted cocktails you can sip on in the comfort of your own home. The brand is offering Metro readers an exclusive 20% off select gift sets from now until March 30th.

It's designed to remove hair, dust, and crumbs and uses LiDAR technology to scan rooms and create efficient cleaning routes. It can run continuously for up to 150 minutes and has a 4.4 rating out of 1,793 reviews. The HOOVER HG4 Dry Robot vacuum cleaner is £189 at Currys and £499.99 at Shark.

articles.summary: Natalie Ochoa recommends Tula Skincare face cleaner, Oars + Alps anti-aging moisturizer, Tree Hut shave oil, Tarte tubing mascara and Chemist Frizz Spray for hair. Products are chosen independently by our editors. Purchases made through our links may earn us a commission.

articles.title: I made an ‘elite' microwave dessert in less than 30 seconds
articles.author: Rebecca Koncienzcy
articles.summary: Rebecca tried the new Nutella donuts now available at Tesco bakery section for £2.65. The Nutella Muffins in twin packs are also available now in Tesco, Morrisons and Iceland. Express gives the Nutella doughnuts a 7 out of 10.

articles.title: Chatbots Are Academically Dishonest
articles.author: Matteo Wong
articles.summary: The AI industry's frenetic development has been dizzying. The industry has a set of industry-wide benchmark tests of AI-model abilities. The problem with these benchmarks is that chatbots seem to be cheating on them. The promise of advancement has become a political issue. The Atlantic entered into a corporate partnership with OpenAI in 2024.

articles.title: Oppo A16: The Little Phone That Could:
articles.summary: Oppo A16 was launched in July 2021 by a Chinese brand. It's a budget smartphone with a 6.52-inch screen and a USB-C port. It has a MediaTek Helio G35 chip with 3GB or 4GB of RAM and a 5000mAh battery. It comes in colors like Pearl Blue and Crystal Black. The camera has a 13MP setup on the back and a 2MP macro and a depth sensor. It runs Android 11 with ColorOS 11.1 on top.

articles.title: How Google Ads Can Transform Your Digital Marketing Presence
articles.summary: Google Ads is a powerful digital advertising platform. It allows businesses to appear at the top of search engine results almost instantly. Google Ads is cost-effective and effective. It provides real-time analytics and performance tracking. It seamlessly integrates with Google Analytics, Google My Business, and YouTube Ads.

articles.title: Best Tablet Brands In India Of 2025 For Students And Professionals
articles.summary: Increase productivity with advanced tablets from brands such as Apple, Samsung, Microsoft, OnePlus, etc. that are a blend of innovation, technology, and unique features. Ideal for students, working professionals, and gamers, these tabs are lightweight and easy to carry around.

articles.summary: Xiaomi Pad 7 Pro runs on a more powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 compared to the Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 used in the standard model. The Pro model has a variant with an antireflective matte glass screen. The keyboard is awesome to use with evenly spaced keys with key travel over 1mm and a full row of function keys. It's similar to Apple's Magic Keyboard.

articles.title: How Business AI Can Help Bring New Products To Market
articles.author: Zoryana Zagorodnya
articles.summary: The alcohol-free movement has exploded in the last few years. Millennials and Gen Z are more aware of the negative impacts of alcohol and are looking for alternatives that align with their fitness goals and overall well-being. Leading brands are already capitalizing on this trend by offering alcohol free versions of their renowned beverages to attract a new demographic and elevate their sales. The first step involves identifying and understanding the target audience. Product design is initiated, encompassing aspects such as taste and packaging, before moving into production.

articles.title: Jinjiang a role model in industrial transformation
articles.author: CAO DESHENG
articles.summary: Ding Shizhong is a member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. He is also chairman of the board of directors of Chinese sportswear brand Anta and vice-chairman of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce. Traditional industries account for over 80 percent of China's manufacturing sector. Ding calls for traditional industries to learn from the "Jinjiang Experience".
